description: Mytherra is a post-fantasy realm where ancient magic coexists with remnants of advanced, forgotten technology. The world is fractured into floating islands, governed by various Factions that either protect the balance or exploit the chaos.

roles.name: Skywarden
roles.description: Guardians of the sky-islands, protectors of ancient relics. They wield both magic and flying machines to maintain balance.

roles.name: Tinker-Seer
roles.description: Inventor-scholars who decode ancient technology and glimpse the future through fractured AI relics.

roles.name: Driftblade
roles.description: Nomadic warriors of the wind. They act as mercenaries, explorers, or rebels depending on their allegiance.
